author: flare(flare#0001)
install_msg:
Append a message to the beginning of X bot messages randomly
This cog relies on the core code of SmileySend by Jack1142
[p]help tips.
**THIS COG REQUIRES D.PY 1.6 WHICH IS NOT ON RED YET!** If you do not have d.py 1.6, unload this cog or your bot will NOT send any messages
name: Tips
short: Append a message to a bot message.
description: Randomly apply a tip message to a bot message randomly.
